data.label: Canticle 10: The Second Song of Isaiah

value.verse: Seek the Lord while he wills to be found; *
value.halfverse: call upon him when he draws near.

value.verse: Let the wicked forsake their ways *
value.halfverse: and the evil ones their thoughts;
and to our God, for he will richly pardon.
value.verse: And let them turn to the Lord, and he will have compassion, *

value.halfverse: nor your ways my ways, says the Lord.
value.verse: For my thoughts are not your thoughts, *

value.halfverse:
so are my ways higher than your ways,
and my thoughts than your thoughts.
value.verse: For as the heavens are higher than the earth, *

value.halfverse: and return not again, but water the earth,
value.verse: For as rain and snow fall from the heavens *
Bringing forth life and giving growth, *
value.halfverse: seed for sowing and bread for eating,
it will not return to me empty;
value.verse: So is my word that goes forth from my mouth; *

value.halfverse: and prosper in that for which I sent it.
value.verse: But it will accomplish that which I have purposed, *
